name: Hearthquake
description:
(This game was made for LÖVE Jam 2022)

1-4 players work together to build a home underground!  Dig for treasure to decorate with, buy stabilizing silk from the worm, and avoid the destructive effects of earthquakes!  Be careful not to disturb the dead...

To win the game, collect 10 decorations

Art and music by CheekyLions, sounds and code by Mazzymuse

CONTROLS
Esc, Enter, or Start to join/leave the game
Tab or Select to pause/unpause
Arrows, WASD, Lstick, or Dpad to move
Z, Space, Bottom or Top face button to jump
X, Shift, Left or Right face button to dig/build/trade
